data.text:
Privacy Policy

The Public Authority for Housing Welfare (The Authority) honors the privacy of your information and shall preserve such information. Further to the powers of the Authority to share information with other government entities in accordance with the laws and private property rights. This information will not be disclosed unless required by law or a judicial ruling.

By using the website, regardless of whether you are a registered user or not, you are considered in agreement of the following terms and conditions:

1) This privacy policy is an integral part of the terms and conditions of this website https://www.pahw.gov.kw

2) The user shall be responsible for the accuracy, authenticity and veracity of the data sent to this website upon registration.

3) A password is sent to registered users upon completion of the registration process. The user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of the user name and password, and assumes full responsibility for all activities conducted as a registered user. The Authority shall not be liable for any damage that may be caused to the user as a result of breach of confidentially in respect of the information sent to the site.

4) The user can print and download parts of the material contained on this website for non- commercial use provided that copyright notice and other rights that appear are retained.

5) Any person or entity attempting or inject any changes or tampering the content of this website will be subject to legal action irrespective of the manner in which such person was able to access the same will be denied.

6) This site contains links to other sites. Third party web sites may have different privacy policies and/ or security standards governing their websites. We therefore encourage you to familiarize yourself with these privacy policies and the terms and conditions of those sites before providing them with any private information. Please note that links to websites not related to the Authority are provided solely for informational purposes. Accordingly, if you choose to access such sites, pahw.gov.kw assumes to liability for privacy practices or the content of such sites.

7) Transactions and dealings concluded with any vendor in connection with any special offers on https://www.pahw.gov.kw will be between you, the vendor, and the Authority will not be a party to or responsible for any such transactions. The Authority hereby disclaims any warranty either express or implied as to any offers displayed on pahw.gov.kw or information provided by the merchant and/ or any third parties.

8) The Authority shall be entitled to take legal action against any user in the event of any loss or damage results from its misuse, whether intentionally or unintentionally.

9) The user acknowledges that in the event of a dispute, Kuwaiti courts shall have sole jurisdiction to consider and the applicable laws shall be Kuwaiti law.

10) The Authority reserves the right to amend, modify and/ or alter in any way the Privacy Policy set out on this site without prior notice.
